00040 require_once($MODEL_PATH.'model.php');
00041 
00042 class Dante extends Model
00043 {
00044     public $Name= 'dante';
00045     public $User= '_dante';
00046     
00047     public $ConfFile= '/etc/sockd.conf';
00048     public $LogFile= '/var/log/sockd.log';
00049     public $VersionCmd= '/usr/local/sbin/sockd -v';
00050     
00051     public $PidFile= '/var/run/sockd.pid';
00052     
00053     function Dante()
00054     {
00055         global $TmpFile;
00056         
00057         parent::Model();
00058         
00059         $this->Proc= 'sockd';
00060         
00061         $this->StartCmd= "/usr/local/sbin/sockd -D > $TmpFile 2>&1 &";
00062     
00063         
00064         $this->Commands= array_merge(
00065             $this->Commands,
00066             array(
00067                 'SetIfs'    => array(
00068                     'argv'  => array(NAME, NAME),
00069                     'desc'  => _('Set ifs'),
00070                     ),
00071                 
00072                 'SetIntnet' => array(
00073                     'argv'  => array(IPRANGE),
00074                     'desc'  => _('Set ifs'),
00075                     ),
00076                 )
00077             );
00078     }
00079     
00080     function SetIfs($lanif, $wanif)
00081     {
00082         $re= '/(\h*internal:\h*)(\w+\d+)(\h+.*external:\h*)(\w+\d+)(\s+)/ms';
00083         return $this->ReplaceRegexp($this->ConfFile, $re, '${1}'.$lanif.'${3}'.$wanif.'${5}');
00084     }
00085 
00086     function SetIntnet($net)
00087     {
00088         global $Re_Ip, $Re_Net;
00089 
00090         $re= "/(\h*client\h+pass\h*\{\s*\h+from:\h+)($Re_Ip|$Re_Net)(\h+.*)/ms";
00091         return $this->ReplaceRegexp($this->ConfFile, $re, '${1}'.$net.'${3}');
00092     }
00093 }
00094 ?>
